title: Primary Teacher

renewed-contributions.title: Glory to God
renewed-contributions.note: The renewal record says this musical composition appeared in the October-December 1957 issue of 'Primary Teacher', but does not make clear whether it appeared in this Primary Teacher or one of the other periodicals linked here with the same title.

renewed-contributions.title: Thanks Be Unto God
renewed-contributions.note: The renewal record says this musical composition appeared in the October-December 1963 issue of 'Primary Teacher', but does not make clear whether it appeared in this Primary Teacher or one of the other periodicals linked here with the same title.

additional-notes: A note in the January-June 1977 Periodicals volume says to 'see copyright office' for full issue renewal information.  The first cataloged issue renewal, mentioned in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume, is for the July-September 1949 issue, and was filed in March of 1977.

Copyrights for magazines with the same title for various Protestant churches were also registered in some of the same years as the Judson Press publication described here.  We do not know if they shared content in common.

Contribution renewals shown here are for works that have renewal records filed as Contributions to Periodicals that specifically mention 'Primary Teacher'.  It is possible that there may also be active renewals filed under Music for other musical compositions that appeared in Primary Teacher.  We have not systematically surveyed Music renewals.
